text: Jasmin Raboshta (born 30 April 1990 in Shkodër) is an Albanian professional footballer who plays for Kosovan club Vushtrria.Jasmin Raboshta firmos në Turqi, përfundon në kategorinë e 5-të‚ panorama.com.al, 9 August 2017 ==Career statistics== ===Luftëtari Gjirokastër=== Following the end of 2011–12, Raboshta extended his contract with Luftëtari Gjirokastër for a further season, kepping him at the club until 2013. ===Butrinti Sarandë=== In August 2014, Raboshta joined on a free transfer Butrinti Sarandë by signing a one- year deal, taking the vacant number 9 for the upcoming 2013–14 season. The team coach Mustafa Hysi stated, "We have wanted him so bad and the president didn't hesitate to fulfil our wish." ===Kastrioti Krujë=== On 27 June 2015, Raboshta was signed by fellow Albanian First Division side Kastrioti Krujë for an undisclosed fee in their bid to achieve promotion back to Albanian Superliga. ===Teuta Durrës=== On 13 July 2016, after a successful individual season with Kastrioti Krujë, Raboshta returned in Albanian Superliga and joined Teuta Durrës on a free transfer, where he penned a one-year contract. Upon signing, Raboshta stated: "I'm part of an important club in Albania and I want to thank the club directors and the coach for believing in me, by making me part of Teuta. For me, it's a pleasure to be part of this team". ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League
